title: Drawing, "Winter, Lunette for Ceiling of Sala Ottagonale, Palazzo Milzetti, Faenza", 1804–05
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and light brown wash over graphite on white laid paper
inscribed: in pen and brown ink, upper right: l'inverno solestisio in capric/orno 21 Xcembre; in graphite, upper center: inverno 7; in graphite: squared off at sides 1-4 and at top 1-8 with light source symbol at middle left
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Winged putto bending and holding hammer and torch.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Winter, Lunette for Ceiling of Sala Ottagonale, Palazzo Milzetti, Faenza", 1804–05.
1804–05. Pen and brown ink, brush and light brown wash over graphite on white laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1188.
